Emulation and decision making under uncertainty in Python.

  • Accessible to everybody, for practitioner and developers.
  • Agnostic to the underlying modelling framework, MXnet, TensorFlow, etc.
  • Open source, commercially usable - APACHE license.

Emukit playground

Jun 13, 2016
Interactive learning tool teaching users about emulation-based decision making. Train a working emulator based on visually driven simulations.

Usage Guide

Jun 12, 2016
Use the guide to prepare good looking posts! The theme has a sidebar in the post layout which consists of post image, recent posts and facebook like box. This can be extended by...

Elements

Jun 10, 2016
Below elements can be used just by adding certain classes to regular html elements. Since the theme is based on Bootstrap, you can use any bootstrap class in this theme.

Post with no image

Jun 9, 2016
When there is no image mentioned in the front-matter, default image will be displayed. You can change this image to any other one that suits your needs.
